ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Cazic gate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually there is an easy way to gate to cazic. if the roamer jump you , just root it , step back and inviso yourself and run away west. i used this gate a
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> James Ashley wrote:
> >
> >From: James Ashley <jimrthy@...>
> >
> >Just in case you missed the earlier discussion
> >(several months back), though, remember that Cazic
> >Gate is essentially suicide at 24. Unless Verant
> >broke down and changed it.
> >
>
> >Just levitate yourself and get as high a possible over the ground,
> floating, when you stop drifting down. Tele then and have an invis
> >ready for when you appear. This has always worked for me.
>
> Yeah, I've tried this tactic myself a few times. I'm pretty sure they still
> aggro me sometimes though...even at 38, I've known them to jump on me. Of
> course, this happens more often than not when I'm TPing into Cazic with
> someone else...you're more likely displaced a little bit off of the pyramid
> where the lizzies will jump you.
>

Actually there is an easy way to gate to cazic. if the roamer jump you ,
just root it , step back and inviso yourself and run away west.
i used this gate a bunch of time and never got any trouble.

Hanidus 50 wiz of karana
